about_the_game:
The owner has been missing for some time, the other toys and video game characters have grown restless. In search for answers the ancient texts were found and they are sparking adventure in the toys, they go to battle to find answers and delve in the Owners realm further.

Choose a team of 4 toys and game characters to fight your way through waves of enemies, build your deck of cards to improve your chances and gain relics that once belonged to the owner.

  • Build your team of Toys and Video game characters.

  • Utilize each character's unique cards that can be upgraded.

  • Build up your deck by defeating enemies or finding chests.

  • Start an adventure that is randomized to gain currency to improve future adventures.

  • Choose your destination on your adventure, your options are random so choose carefully. The more enemies defeated the weaker the final boss is but you may miss out of better cards or upgrades.

  • Find lost items that power up your team.

  • Unique enemies and bosses.
detailed_description:
Early Access Update #8


This week's update adds what will most likely be the last character, the Wanderer.
This enigmatic character isn't bound to one time or place and has amassed an arsenal of weapons and tools that help in their adventures, you might even find out that they can use more than their own abilities.


Early Access Update #7


This week's update adds a new playable support character, the Combat Medic.
Fighting on the front lines the Combat Medic fights with their medic pack at their side but people could find themselves in danger since they are also an expert marksman.


Early Access Update #6

I have added a new enemy type, the Toy Vacuum. It can attack like most enemies but it can also steal the players shield and damage buffs and use it for itself.
Outside of this I have made some small changes in text and made it so that the music in a scene won't change while still in the same scene.


Early Access Update #5

New Cards








When selecting a card to upgrade in the blacksmith it will show what the stats will change to.
When the first boss is defeated the map will now change.
When transitioning to a different map the player icon is correctly placed.
Holy Radiance now doesn't gain damage values from Lost Items.
Action Trading card now works properly if you have more than one.


Early Access Update #4

Clues have been hidden in the game, they can be collected and viewed on the whiteboard in the game menu.
Fixed an issue where bonus cards gained from combat don't display or do damage that they should.
Fixed an issue with going to the settings screen when viewing the map and the nav icon moving incorrectly.


Early Access Update #3

Over time I have fixed many bugs, too many to mention but there was a major bug to do with any armour mechanics which should be working now. Some notable updates though are 2 new cards that you can get through rewards from combat, the first is Roll Dice.

And the other is Holy Radiance for the Priest.


Early Access Update #2

This week I have added a new boss enemy called the Vampire as well as a new neutral card Falling Star, this card attacks 3 random enemies for 2 damage. I have also been playing around with the UI to make it more interesting.

Another added feature is the Figure-Pedia, in the opening menu you can now view the starter cards for the 6 playable characters.


Early Access Update #1

Early Access update #1
I've added two new enemy types, the first is the Hammer Cannon, it is a tough battler like the Army Man and Soldier enemies. The second is the Lich, the Lich can put its own cards in your deck forcing you to use them to clear your hand.


About the Game

The owner has been missing for some time, the other toys and video game characters have grown restless. In search for answers the ancient texts were found and they are sparking adventure in the toys, they go to battle to find answers and delve in the Owners realm further.

Choose a team of 4 toys and game characters to fight your way through waves of enemies, build your deck of cards to improve your chances and gain relics that once belonged to the owner.

  • Build your team of Toys and Video game characters.

  • Utilize each character's unique cards that can be upgraded.

  • Build up your deck by defeating enemies or finding chests.

  • Start an adventure that is randomized to gain currency to improve future adventures.

  • Choose your destination on your adventure, your options are random so choose carefully. The more enemies defeated the weaker the final boss is but you may miss out of better cards or upgrades.

  • Find lost items that power up your team.

  • Unique enemies and bosses.
name: Figures Of Heroes

  • OS: Windows 10
